name: Change themehdr URL
author: Veaceslav Mindru

sections.description:
When you transfer your WP from one domain to another, you might want to update
theme header image url option from theme_mods_theme inside wp_options.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder change-wp-url to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Backup your database. (Either get a plugin to do this, or do it with phpMyAdmin)
  4. Use this BEFORE you move your install to the new location: this should be the last thing you do before moving
  5. Plugin will figureout your curent domain and will propose new URL for
    header,background,background thumb URL
  6. Accept proposed URL’s or modify them as needed and update the DB
sections.faq:
Q: Dose it work
